lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Chancellor of the Exchequer Nigel Lawson's budget contained virtually everything the government bond (gilts) market had hoped for and is likely to help prices race ahead in coming months, analysts and traders said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The lower PSBR means the Bank of England will have to offer far less new stock to the market to meet its funding needs and the scarcity factor is sure to drive prices up further, analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Chase Manhattan Securities Ltd international economist Andy Wrobleski noted the Bank has already raised about 1.8 billion stg of next year's funding needs this year via a series of tap issues.
